name: created_at
description: Timestamp of Tweet creation

name: in_reply_to_status_id
description: ID of the Tweet to which this is a reply

name: in_reply_to_user_id
description: ID of the User whose Tweet to which this is a reply

name: in_reply_to_screen_name
description: Name of the User whose Tweet to which this is a reply

name: location_latitude
description: Latitude of the Tweet's location

name: location_longitude
description: Longitude of the Tweet's location

name: favorite_count
description: The number of times this Tweet has been favorited

name: retweet_count
description: The number of times this Tweet has been retweeted

name: retweeted_status_id
description: The ID of the Tweet of which this is a Retweet

name: quoted_status_id
description: The ID of the Tweet that is quoted

name: language
description: The estimated language of the Tweet

name: place_name
description: Default name of the Place

name: place_type
description: The type of Place described

name: place_full_name
description: Verbose name of the Tweet Place

name: user_name
description: The proper name of the User

name: user_screen_name
description: The displayed name of the User

name: user_location
description: The User's provided location

name: user_created_at
description: Timestamp of the User account's creation

name: user_favorites_count
description: Total number of favorites of the User

name: user_statuses_count
description: Total number of Tweets made by the User

name: user_listed_count
description: Number of times the User appears in public lists

name: user_language
description: User's preferred language
